meanings.definition: To add someone as a friend on a social networking site.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy friending new people on social media.
meanings.sent2: She is always friending classmates to stay connected.
meanings.sent3: Friending others online can lead to interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, friending has become a common way to expand social circles.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to practice caution when friending strangers online.

meanings.definition: The act of making friends or forming a friendship.
meanings.sent1: Her friending of others is genuine and kind.
meanings.sent2: The friending process can be exciting and rewarding.
meanings.sent3: I find joy in the simplicity of friending new people.
meanings.sent4: The art of friending requires patience and understanding.
meanings.sent5: His friending skills make him popular among peers.
